title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 about ethics in natural language processing (NLP) and best practices
<|assistant|>

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 about ethics in natural language processing (NLP) and best practices. These articles cover various aspects of ethical considerations in NLP, including bias, privacy, transparency, and accountability
Bias in AI: The Role of Data and Algorithms
This article
container-title: published in Nature Machine Intelligence in 2020, discusses the role of data and algorithms in perpetuating bias in AI systems

title: This article, published in AI Now Institute in 2019, explores the ethical implications of NLP and argues for a more human-centered approach to the development and deployment of these systems
